menuItems.name: Salmon Pasta
menuItems.description: Fresh salmon tossed with creamy Alfredo sauce and linguine, garnished with parsley.

menuItems.description: Juicy steak cooked with peppercorn sauce, served with saut√©ed vegetables and mashed potatoes.

menuItems.name: Margherita Pizza
menuItems.description: Classic Italian pizza with fresh tomatoes, mozzarella cheese, and basil leaves.

menuItems.name: Chicken Caesar Salad
menuItems.description: Grilled chicken breast on a bed of crisp romaine lettuce, topped with Caesar dressing, croutons, and Parmesan cheese.

menuItems.name: Vegetable Stir-Fry
menuItems.description: Colorful mix of fresh vegetables stir-fried in a savory soy-ginger sauce, served with steamed rice.

menuItems.name: Beef Tacos
menuItems.description: Soft tortillas filled with seasoned beef, lettuce, cheese, salsa, and sour cream.

menuItems.name: Spaghetti Carbonara
menuItems.description: Classic Italian pasta dish with pancetta, eggs, and Parmesan cheese, tossed in a creamy sauce.

menuItems.name: Grilled Salmon
menuItems.description: Fresh salmon fillet grilled to perfection, served with a side of roasted potatoes and asparagus.

menuItems.name: Mushroom Risotto
menuItems.description: Creamy risotto with wild mushrooms, garlic, and a touch of white wine, garnished with parsley.

menuItems.name: Prawn Pad Thai
menuItems.description: Stir-fried rice noodles with prawns, eggs, peanuts, bean sprouts, and a tangy tamarind sauce.

menuItems.name: Chicken Tikka Masala
menuItems.description: Tender chicken pieces cooked in a rich, spiced tomato sauce, served with basmati rice and naan bread.

menuItems.name: Quinoa Salad
menuItems.description: A nutritious salad with quinoa, avocado, cherry tomatoes, cucumbers, and a lemon vinaigrette.

menuItems.name: Seafood Paella
menuItems.altText: seafood paella with shrimp and mussels
menuItems.description: Traditional Spanish dish with saffron rice, shrimp, mussels, clams, and bell peppers.

menuItems.name: Lamb Chops
menuItems.description: Grilled lamb chops marinated with rosemary and garlic, served with mint yogurt sauce.

menuItems.name: Eggplant Parmesan
menuItems.description: Layers of breaded eggplant, marinara sauce, and melted mozzarella, baked to perfection.

menuItems.name: Duck Confit
menuItems.description: French-style slow-cooked duck leg served with crispy potatoes and a side salad.

menuItems.name: Vegan Buddha Bowl
menuItems.altText: vegan buddha bowl with colorful veggies
menuItems.description: A colorful bowl of quinoa, roasted chickpeas, avocado, kale, and a tahini dressing.

menuItems.name: BBQ Ribs
menuItems.description: Tender pork ribs glazed with BBQ sauce, served with coleslaw and fries.

menuItems.name: Thai Green Curry
menuItems.description: Spicy Thai green curry with chicken, coconut milk, bamboo shoots, and jasmine rice.

menuItems.name: Fish and Chips
menuItems.altText: fish and chips with tartar sauce
menuItems.description: Crispy battered fish fillets served with golden fries, tartar sauce, and a lemon wedge.
